parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can specify the ID of the server or container. You can specify only one ID.

parameters.name: NatType
parameters.description:
The type of the NAT gateway. The value must be of the enumerated data type. Valid values:

*   SNAT
*   DNAT

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the rule. If you leave this parameter empty, all rules are queried.
